title: Slums situated in lands falling under various reservations/zones in the DP shall be developed in accordance with the Regulation No 17(3)(D)
clause_text: Slums situated in lands falling under various reservations/zones in the DP shall be developed in accordance with the Regulation No 17(3)(D).
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements:
